actions.committee: House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce.

official_title: A bill to amend section 1625 of the Public Health Service Act to authorize grants under that section to be made to nonprofit private hospitals.

summary.text: Amends title XVI of the Public Health Service Act (Health Resources Development) to authorize construction and modernization project grants designed to eliminate safety hazards or to avoid noncompliance with accreditation standards to be made to nonprofit private medical facilities, in addition to State and local governments as currently provided.

titles.title: A bill to amend section 1625 of the Public Health Service Act to authorize grants under that section to be made to nonprofit private hospitals.
